name: A.I.M. Agents, Army - A.I.M.
effect: Discard A.I.M. Agents [>] Target [Crime Lords] defender has reinforcement this attack.
"Don't hurt me! I joined for the dental plan!"

name: Aaron Stack, Hater of Fleshy Ones
effect:
Reservist
At the start of the combat phase, move all characters adjacent to Aaron Stack so that they're no adjacent to him.
Aaron - is going to organize you sock drawer!

name: Abomination, Emil Blonsky
effect: Whenever one or more opposing characters enter combat with Abomination, remove all counters from them and put a +1 / +1 counter on Abomination.

name: Above the Law
effect:
To play, replace X reservist resources you control.
Target [Avengers] attacker gets +X ATK this attack. If that character is a leader, it also gets +X DEF this attack.

name: Acts of Vengeance
effect: If a Red Skull you control would become stunned this turn, instead, you may stun another character you control.
"I can't believe we didn't think of this before!"

name: Adam Warlock, Savior of the Universe
effect: Whenever another character becomes stunned during the combat phase, put it on top of its owner's deck.
"So, the time has come, once again, to play the role of messiah."

name: Aegis, Lady of All Sorrows
effect: At the start of the combat phase, KO all characters and resources.
"...ready now to mete out the sorrow of our revenge."

name: Agents of H.A.T.E.
effect: While attacking a character, each team attacker gets +1 ATK this attack for each other team attacker that shares a version with it.
It's like Shakespeare, but with lots more punching.

name: Alias Investigations
effect: {Activate} ---> Rally for a card type of your choice.
"What the #$!% do you want?"

name: Alpha Flight: Reborn
effect:
Play only if you control an [Alpha Flight] character and only from your hand.
Return target plot twist or [Alpha Flight] character card from your KO'd pile to your hand. Remove Alpha Flight: Reborn from the game.

name: Annihilating Conquest
effect: Whenever three or more Army team attackers you control stun a defender this turn, you may ready one of those attackers.

name: Annihilus, Anti-Matter Master
effect:
When Annihilus enters play, if Negative Zone is not in play, exhaust him.
{Activate} ---> Stun target hidden character. Use only during your attack step.

name: Annihilus, The Living Death That Walks
effect: At the start of the combat phase, KO up to X target resources, where X is the number of Negative Zone locations in play.
"I am Annihilus. My name means death!"

name: Archangel, Champion
effect:
Discard Archangel [>] target Hulk gets +3 ATK while attacking and has flight this turn.
{Activate} ---> Return Archangel to its owner's hand. Use only during the combat phase.
"Killing seems to be the only thing he's got in mind."

name: Ares, Mighty Avenger
effect:
To recruit, discard an [Avengers] or [SHIELD] character card.
Reservist
If the controller of a character in combat with Ares would take an amount of stun endurance loss, instead, he takes twice that amount.
"Idiot mortals. You have no idea when it's time to fight!"

name: Arnim Zola, The Bio-Fanatic - Raid
effect:
Concealed-Optional
{Activate}, KO a character you control [>] Target player loses 2 endurance and you gain 2 endurance.
"As long as I have my work, I need nothing else."

name: Asgard
effect: {Activate} ---> Put target character card from your KO'd pile on top of your deck.

name: Assault on Hellicarrier 13
effect: Whenever a [Crime Lords] character you control attacks this turn, you may exhaust an opposing character.

name: Atlantean Warriors, Army
effect:
Concealed
You can recruit Atlantean Warrior from your KO'd pile while you control Sub-Mariner.
Whenever Atlantean Warriors enters a KO'd pile from play, remove it from the game.

name: Atlantis
effect: {Activate}, Exhaust a Sub-Mariner you control [>] Remove target card in a KO'd pile from the game. You may play that card this turn.
"Below the waves, that is my domain. My kingdom."

name: Atlantis Attacks!
effect: Rally for a character card. If you're successful, target [Avengers] attacker you control gets +X ATK this attack, where X is the cost of that character card.

name: Avengers Forever
effect: Ongoing: Discard X [Avengers] character cards [>] Put a +1 / +1 counter of each of X target characters. Use only once per turn and only during the build phase.

name: Avengers Reassembled
effect:
Search your deck for an [Avengers] character card, reveal it, and put it on top of your deck.
Boost - Discard a card: Replace a resource you control.
"Smile for the cameras, Spidey."

name: Baron Strucker, Baron Wolfgang Von Strucker - HYDRA
effect: Whenever Baron Strucker becomes stunned while defending with reinforcement, recover him. This power triggers only once per turn.
"I own you, body and soul."

name: Beetle as Mach, Discharged
effect:
At the start of your recruit step, put a +1 / +1 counter on Beetle.
While Beetle has two or more +1 / +1 counters, he can't be stunned while attacking.

name: Beta Ray Bill, Simon Walters - Omega Flight
effect: At the start of the combat phase, you may stun target character with cost less than the number of plot twists you played this turn.

name: Bill Foster as Goliath, Secret Avenger
effect:
Reservist
Whenever Bill Foster becomes stunned, KO him. If you do, characters can't attack this turn.
"You mark my words, they'll be coming after all of us after this."

effect: Boost - Return a character you control with cost X to its owner's hand: When Bishop enters play, you may put a [SHIELD] or [X-Men] character card with cost X or less from your hand into play, if you haven't controlled a character with that name this turn.

name: Black Bolt, Enemy Within
effect:
Concealed-Optional
Black Bolt gets +1 / +1 for each non-[Skrull] affiliation he has.

effect:
Concealed
Exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control [>] Replace target resource you control and target face-up resource an opponent controls. Use only once per turn. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

effect:
Concealed

Concealed

Concealed
Substitute

Concealed

Reservist

effect: If another [Avengers] or Invaders character you control would become stunned, instead, you may exhaust Captain America.

effect: While Captain America is visible in your front row, other characters you control can't be stunned.

name: Swarm of Annihilus
effect:
Play only if you control Annihilus.
Stun target character with cost less than or equal to the number of Negative Locations in play.

name: Switching Sides
effect:
To play, exhaust an [Avengers] character you control.
Move target stunned character to your front row. It gains the [Avengers] affiliation.
"Consider this a divorce!"

name: Swordsman, Andreas Von Strucker
effect:
Substitute
{Activate} ---> Target character gets -3 DEF this turn. Use only if you control four or more resources.
"What kind of psycho wraps his sword in his dead sister's skin?"

name: Tabitha Smith, Zomg!
effect:
Reservist
At the start of the combat phase, steal a +1 / +1 counter from target character and put it on Tabitha Smith. (She now owns that counter.)
Tabby - is gonna steal all your stuff!

name: Talisman, Elizabeth Twoyoungmen - Omega Flight
effect: When Talisman enters play, rally for a plot twist card.

name: Taskmaster, Super Hero Trainer
effect:
Substitute
When Taskmaster enters play, put a +1 / +1 counter on him for each resource you control more than three.
{Activate}, Remove a counter from Taskmaster [>] Put a +1 / +1 counter on target character.

name: Tenebrous, Of the Darkness
effect: At the start of the combat phase, each player's endurance total becomes 0.
"Long have we slumbered in shadows and darkness..."

name: Thanos, The Mad Titan
effect: {Activate} ---> Put target character or location card from your KO'd pile face-down into your resource row. If you do, KO a resource you control. Use only once per turn.
"Thanos serves no master. Be comforted that our goals are the same, for now."

name: The 100 Ideas
effect:
Play only if you control Mr. Fantastic.
Look at the bottom four cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"It helps to have my ideas spread out, so I can see it all."

name: The Beyonder, Inhuman
effect: Remove The Beyonder and another card in your hand from the game [>] Recover target stunned character if there are no other cards named The Beyonder removed from the game. Use only if The Beyonder is in your hand.
"Say the word, and it's yours."

name: The Big Three
effect:
Target [Avengers] character gets +2 ATK while attacking this turn.
Boost - replace two reservist resources you control: Up to two other target [Avengers] characters each get +2 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: The Captain, Can't Remember His Real Name
effect:
Reservist
At the start of the combat phase, choose a name that The Captain doesn't have. He gains that name, and then say all his names. If you do so correctly, draw a card.
The Captain - his name is The Captain!

name: The Centurians, Army
effect:
At the start of the combat phase, if Negative Zone is not in play, discard a card.
The Centurians cannot be stunned while attacking.

name: The Elektra Situation
effect:
To play, exhaust two different members of the Illuminati you control. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)
Choose a name.
Ongoing:Opposing characters with that name lose and can't have powers and keywords.

name: The End of the World
effect:
To play, stun X [Warbound] characters you control.
Put X +1 / +1 counters on target Hulk.
"I will never leave you."

name: The Gorgon, Tomi Shishido - HYDRA
effect:
Concealed
Whenever a character attacks you directly, it can't ready this turn.

name: The Great Arena
effect: {Activate}, Exhaust a Hulk you control with cost X [>] Exhaust target character with cost X or less. Each player loses X endurance. Use only during the build phase.

name: The Hand, Army - HYDRA
effect:
Concealed
{Activate}, Put The Hand on top of its owner's deck [>] Recover target stunned [Crime Lords] character that defended this turn.

name: The Hood, Prince of Pistols
effect:
Concealed
Discard X cards [>] Exhaust target character with cost X.
"Go on, underestimate me. Everyone does."

name: The Infinity Gauntlet
effect: Ongoing: Exhaust six different members of the Illuminati you control [>] Choose one: KO target character; KO target resource; or target player discards his hand. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)

name: The Initiative, Team-Up
effect:
To play, choose a leader you control and any number of its affiliations.
Draw a card.
Ongoing:Characters you control gain those affiliations.

name: The Raft
effect: At the start of your recruit step, each player loses 1 endurance for each character he controls.
"Adamantium reinforced steel. Twenty-four hour surveillance. Underwater. Welcome to the Raft."

name: The Reckoning
effect:
To play, exhaust a character you control.
Put the top card of your deck into your KO'd pile, and each player loses endurance equal to its cost. If you exhausted a character named Thor this way, ready him.

name: The Sentry, Mighty Avenger
effect:
Loyalty, Reservist
{Activate}, Remove The Sentry from the game [>] Remove target character from the game. At the start of the recovery phase this turn, return The Sentry to play.
"I don't throw everything into the sun."

name: The Sleeper, Doomsday Device - Raid
effect:
Reservist
[Crime Lords] characters you control can attack opponents directly and can't attack characters.
"Wake the Sleeper!"

name: The Stamford Incident
effect: Stun each character with cost 1 or less, then discard a card for each opposing character stunned this way.

name: The Strongest One There Is
effect:
To play, stun a defending Hulk you control with cost X or more.
KO target attacker with cost X.
"Puny humans, you're just making me stronger."

name: The T-Wagon
effect: Exhaust The T-Wagon [>] Target [Thunderbolts] attacker or defender gets +2 ATK this attack, or +4 ATK if it's ready.

name: The Wrong Stuff, Team-Up
effect:
Play only if you control a [Thunderbolts] character.
To play, discard a card.
Ongoing:Crossover [Thunderbolts] and the printed affiliations of the card you discarded.

name: The Zeus, Unique
effect:
The Zeus costs 1 less if you control five or more resources.
[Thunderbolts] characters you control get +1 / +1 and have flight and range.

name: Thing, Conscientious Objector
effect:
Thing can't attack.
A character protected by Thing can't be attacked.
"Fergit 'dis. I'm going tah France."

name: Thor, Cyborg Clone
effect: Discard your hand [>] Target player loses X endurance and you draw X cards, where X is the number of [SHIELD] character cards you discarded this way. Use only once per turn.

name: Thor, Donald Blake
effect: Whenever Thor stuns an opposing character, you may discard your hand. If you do, stun each character with cost equal to the cost of a card discarded this way.
"Son of Odin, God of Thunder; who commands the lightning and the storm. I am Thor!"

name: Thou Art No Thor!
effect:
Pay only if you control an [Avengers] character.
KO target stunned character with cost 5 or more.
"Thor was a friend of mine..."

name: Thunderbolts Mountain
effect:
Terraform
{Activate} ---> Put the top card of your deck face down into your resource row. At the start of the recovery phase this turn, KO a resource you control. Use only if you control a [Thunderbolts] character and only during the combat phase.

name: Tigra, Greer Grant Nelson
effect:
Reservist
When Tigra enters play, target character loses and can't have reinforcement this turn.

name: Tortune Chamber
effect:
{Activate}, KO a character you control [>] Target player loses 2 endurance.
At the start of the recovery phase, if you control Dr. Doom, ready Torture Chamber.

name: Trouble With Dinosaurs
effect: Target attacker gets +8 ATK this attack and -1 ATK for each character you control.
"Hulk smash puny dinosaur!"

name: Ultron, Ultron Prime
effect:
At the start of the combat phase, put a +1 / +1 counter on target opposing creature.
Ultron cannot be stunned while in combat with an opposing character with one or more +1 / +1 counters.

name: Uncertain Legacy
effect: Search your deck for a character card with the same name as a character you control, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
"You think killing me is going to bring him back?"

name: Underground Laboratory
effect: Exhaust a [Crime Lords] defender you control with reinforcement [>] Draw a card.
Knowing HYDRA, it's probably in our best interests to nuke the joint."

name: Underground Movement, Team-Up
effect:
Ongoing: Character cards you own gain the Anti-Registration affiliation and lose and can't gain the Pro-Registration affiliation.
Whenever a visible character you control enters combat, you may move it to your hidden area.

name: Undisclosed Location, Non-Unique
effect:
Terraform
{Activate} ---> Target member of the Illuminati has reinforcement this attack. (The members of the Illuminati are Black Bolt, Dr. Strange, Iron Man, Mr. Fantastic, Professor X, and Sub-Mariner.)
At the start of the recover phase, replace Undisclosed Location.

name: Unregistered Combatants
effect:
Play only if you control a [Thunderbolts] character.
Target defender gets -4 / -4 this attack and then gets +1 / +1 for each character adjacent to it.
"Come quietly, and we won't kill you too badly."

name: Venom, Brain-Eater
effect: {Activate} ---> KO target stunned character and gain endurance equal to its cost.
"Get out of my way, I'm playing super hero!"

name: Venom, Faithless Monster
effect:
{Activate} ---> KO target stunned character.
Whenever Venom attacks, if no other character you control has attacked this turn, you may ready him. If you do, he can't attack this turn.

name: Viper, Madame Hydra - HYDRA
effect:
Concealed
Viper can attack hidden characters and can't attack visible characters.
Viper can attack an opponent directly while he controls no characters she can attack.
"We will continue this charade, because really, you have no choice."

name: Vision, Young Avenger
effect: While Vision is team attacking with exactly one other character, team attacks can cause breakthrough.

name: War Machine, Director of the Initiative
effect:
Reservist
Characters get -1 / -1 while attacking War Machine.
"Until Tony Stark says different, I'm in charge of this operation. Anyone got a problem with that?"

name: Warbound to the End
effect:
To play, discard a character card.
Search your deck for a card named Hulk. If you control Hulk, you may search for any [Warbound] character card instead. Reveal that card and put it into your hand.
"In life and death, the oath cannot be broken."

name: Wasp, Mighty Avenger
effect: Whenever Wasp defends, return her to her owner's hand and remove all attackers from this attack.

name: Wave of Destruction
effect:
Play only if you control Annihilus.
To play, pay X endurance.
Replace X target face-up resources.
"Lord Annihilus's will is the way."

name: Weapon Omega, Michael Pointer - Omega Flight
effect:
Whenever an opponent plays a plot twist from his hand, remove it from the game. (This doesn't negate it.)
You may play cards removed this way.

name: What If?, Team-Up
effect:
To play, choose an affiliation among opposing characters.
Ongoing:Affiliated characters you control gain that affiliation.

name: Wiccan, William Kaplan - Young Avenger
effect: Discard a character card [>] target attacker can't be stunned this attack. Use only if Wiccan is attacking.

name: Wolverine, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. - HYDRA
effect:
Concealed
Reservist
To recruit, return a [Crime Lords] or [SHIELD] character you control to its owner's hand.
Wolverine can attack players directly.
"I can feel them in my head. I can't...stop myself."

name: Wolverine, Secret Avenger
effect:
Concealed
Reservist
Wolverine can attack hidden characters.
Whenever Wolvering stuns an opposing character, ready him if there are no non-stunned opposing characters.
"Touch me again, and I'll gut ya."

name: Wolverine, Weapon 10
effect:
Concealed
Reservist
When Wolverine enters play, choose a name.
{Activate}, Return Wolverine to his owner's hand [>] Target character with that name get -X DEF this turn, where X is its DEF.

name: Wonder Man, Mighty Avenger
effect:
Reservist
If Wonder Man would cause any amount of breakthrough, instead, you may stun a character with DEF less than or equal to that amount.

name: World War Hulk, Team-Up
effect:
Play only if you control Hulk or a [Warbound] character.
To play, choose an affiliation other than [Warbound].
Ongoing:Crossover [Warbound] and that affiliation.

name: Yelena Belova as Black Widow, Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. - HYDRA
effect:
Concealed
Return Yelena Belova to her owner's hand [>] KO target stunned character. Use only during the recovery phase.
"No survivors."

name: You're Under Arrest!
effect:
Play only if you control a [SHIELD] character.
Negate target activated effect from a character.
Boost - Return a character you control to its owner's hand: The character whose effect was negated can't ready this turn.

name: Young Avengers
effect: [Avengers] characters you control get +2 ATK while attacking characters this attack. If you control an attacking leader, attackers you control can't be stunned this attack.
